title: Everglades National Park: Education
body: Everglades: A Remarkable Classroom Welcome Teachers and Educators  Since 1971, we have partnered with teachers to provide curriculum-based, environmental education programs. Use Everglades National Park as your classroom to:  plan a field trip find lesson plans attend workshops for professional development use distance learning activities and videos request loan materials request guest speakers  Your students will thank you!                 Everglades curriculum materials The one-stop shop for your teaching and lesson planning needs.
